what: Split, Combine and Compress PDF Files
title: Split, Combine and Compress PDF Files
text: Split, Combine Compress PDF files  Content-preserving transformations transformations PDF files split, combine, compress. package interfaces directly ‘qpdf’ C++ API require command line utilities. Note ‘qpdf’ read actual content PDF files: extract text data need ‘pdftools’ package.

title: Split, Combine and Compress PDF Files
text: functions take one input output pdf files. [1] "/Users/jeroen/Downloads/v71i02_output.pdf"

what: Split, Combine and Compress PDF Files — qpdf
title: Split, Combine and Compress PDF Files — qpdf
text: Content-preserving transformations transformations PDF files. Note qpdf read actual content PDF files: extract text data need pdftools package.

title: Split, Combine and Compress PDF Files — qpdf
code: pdf_split(input, output = NULL, password = "")  pdf_length(input, password = "")  pdf_subset(input, pages = 1, output = NULL, password = "")  pdf_combine(input, output = NULL, password = "")  pdf_compress(input, output = NULL, linearize = FALSE, password = "")  pdf_overlay_stamp(input, stamp, output = NULL, password = "")  pdf_rotate_pages(   input,   pages,   angle = 90,   relative = FALSE,   output = NULL,   password = "" )

title: Split, Combine and Compress PDF Files — qpdf
text: input path url input pdf file output base path output file(s) password string password open pdf file pages vector page numbers rotate linearize enable pdf linearization (streamable pdf) stamp pdf file first page overlayed page input angle rotation angle degrees (positive = clockwise) relative TRUE, pages rotated relative current orientation. FALSE, rotation absolute (0 = portrait, 90 = landscape, rotated 90 degrees clockwise portrait)

title: Split, Combine and Compress PDF Files — qpdf
text: Currently package provides following wrappers: pdf_length: show number pages pdf pdf_split: split single pdf separate files, one page pdf_subset: create new pdf subset input pages pdf_combine: join several pdf files one pdf_compress: compress linearize pdf file pdf_rotate_pages: rotate selected pages functions modify input file: create new output file(s) return path(s) newly created files.

title: Split, Combine and Compress PDF Files — qpdf
code: # \donttest{ # extract some pages pdf_file <- file.path(tempdir(), "output.pdf") pdf_subset('https://cran.r-project.org/doc/manuals/r-release/R-intro.pdf',   pages = 1:3, output = pdf_file) #> [1] "/tmp/RtmpkzLiXl/output.pdf" pdf_length(pdf_file) #> [1] 3 unlink(pdf_file) # }
